[b][color=white]Game Update #4[/color][/b]
Missions are a whole new mode to play in HackForums' Hack Game. You can now upgrade your cloud drive storage from the shop. In addition to those two new features, the jail system is being reworked to make a more in-depth justice system. Logs have been implemented so you can view your past actions throughout Hack Game.[i][size=x-small][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5969664] >>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[align=center][img]https://hackforums.news/assets/v4/gamingnews-crescent.png[/img][/align]

[b][color=white]Outer Wilds Picked up By Epic Store and Fans Are Not Happy[/color][/b] 
Recently, The Epic Games Store has purchased another title, the highly anticipated Outer Wilds. Mobius Digital, the studio behind the title announced that Outer Wilds will release through The Epic Games Store and not the Steam store where it originally was advertised on their crowdfunding page. Long-time backers of Outer Wilds are not happy. Comparing this to False Advertisement, and a "Bait and switch." This does not come as a surprise for many after The Division 2 and Borderlands 3 were picked up by epic.  [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.gamespot.com/articles/epic-games-store-picks-up-another-pc-timed-exclusi/1100-6466834/]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]A New Mobile Pokemon Game Is In The Works[/color][/b] 
A new Pokemon game is on its way! DeNA, a Japanese development company has recently announced its partnering with Nintendo for a new Pokemon game said to release in the next couple of months. "We plan to launch a new and exciting smartphone game this fiscal year based on the globally popular Pokemon franchise in partnership with The Pokemon Company," DeNA said in a financial report. DeNA has partnered with Nintendo many times before creating titles like Super Mario Run and Fire emblem heroes. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.gamespot.com/articles/a-new-pokemon-mobile-game-is-in-development/1100-6466797/]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Steam Summer Sale Dates Have Been Leaked[/color][/b] 
Steam's 2019 Summer Sale dates have been leaked. The Steam Database Twitter account spotted the Chinese Steam Community page. The leak says that the Steam Summer Sale will go live on June 25 at 10 AM PT / 1 PM ET / 5 PM GMT and will last for around two weeks. After rumors of the Epic Games Store going through with their first big sale, Steam will have to step up their game to keep up. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.gamespot.com/articles/steam-summer-sale-2019-dates-leaked/1100-6466925/]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[color=transparent]   [/color]

[align=center][img]https://hackforums.news/assets/v4/businessnews-bear.png[/img][/align]

[b][color=white]China Plays Its Next Move in the on Going Trade War[/color][/b] 
The ongoing trade war between the USA and China shows no sign of slowing down as new tariffs and levies were announced this week. China, in a retaliatory move against the US, will increase levies on $60 billion worth of US imports. The US had previously stated that $300 billion of Chinese imports would face a 25% tariffs. It had been expected that the dispute would have been resolved by trade talks that the two countries had been having with one another. However, President Trump announced that the talks had stalled. He said that he plans on meeting President Xi in Japan next week. The disputeâ€™s effects have rippled out throughout the world and have benefited some at the expense of others. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.wsj.com/articles/china-to-raise-tariffs-on-certain-u-s-imports-11557750380]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Boeing Simulators Join the List of Worries for the Airline Manufacturer[/color][/b] 
Boeing is in the news again for producing another defective product. In the wake of the two fatal crashes in Ethiopia and Indonesia Boeing has been under intense scrutiny. After the accidents, airlines around the world acquired flight simulators to use to train their pilots. It has, however, been discovered that the simulators are faulty. They cannot accurately replicate the difficult conditions created by a malfunctioning anti-stall system. The system played a key role in both crashes. The simulators could not simulate the immense force the pilot would have to exert to regain control if the system malfunctioned. These revelations bring even more scrutiny to the company. Boeing had said they fixed the error, but the planes have not yet been allowed to fly again by global regulators. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.nytimes.com/2019/05/17/business/boeing-737-max-simulators.html]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Bitcoin Rally Ends With a Crash Down to $6,894[/color][/b] 
A crash in the value of bitcoin wiped $32 billion from the market. The devastating crash was triggered by a $35 million sell order. The subsequent flash crash sent the value of the bitcoin down to as low as $6,894. Before the crash analysts had predicted the value could rise to an all-time high of $20,000. However, not all is lost. This crash allows analysts to better understand the nature of the rally leading up to it. Analysts should now be able to determine whether it is a bull market or just a bull run. Also, this crash provides an opportunity for those who want to enter the market to buy in at a cheaper price. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.ccn.com/crypto-crash-could-supercharge-bitcoin-price-rally-to-20000]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[color=transparent]    [/color]

[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2890436][img]https://hackforums.news/assets/v4/trends-pikachu.png[/img][/url][/align]

[b][color=white]The World's Largest JELLO Pool[/color][/b] 
YouTuber Mark Rober has managed to create a literal pool of JELLO in his brother's backyard. Before they went through with the main experiment though, they ran countless of other experiments with JELLO beforehand so they can measure the exact temperatures they need in order to make the JELLO pool experiment a success. The final results of the JELLO pool were indeed successful, Towards the end of the video they end it off with a JELLO Slip-N-Slide. Trying to swim in a pool of JELLO and playing with a slipping slide with JELLO does actually sound like loads of fun. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DPZzrlFCD_I]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]New Slipknot Music Video: Unsainted[/color][/b] 
Slipknot just released a new music video featuring their new song "Unsainted." The new song sounds pretty cool, and the video that goes with it is even better. From the looks of it, they seem to have a fresh set of new masks, and it also looks to be like there is a new member of the band. The new song is part of their new upcoming album "We are not your kind" which is available for preorder now. The new album will be released on August 9, 2019. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VpATBBRajP8]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]New Batwoman Series Coming to The CW[/color][/b] 
Yet another DC universe series is coming out, this time it's Batwoman. From the looks of it, Batman has abandoned Gotham city, crime is at an all time high and without a crime fighting vigilante like Batman who's going to help keep the criminals at bay? That is where Batwoman comes in. The main character managed to stumble upon the bat-cave, finding Batman's old suit. She ended up getting the suit fitted so it would fit a woman, like herself.  From that point on, she goes off to fight crime as Batwoman. I'm looking forward to checking this series out; hopefully, it is not a disappointing series. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vrIiPcv4_iY]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[color=transparent]   [/color][/size][/font]
posts.subject: RE: Hack Forums News // Edition 435
